titleStmt.title: Resolved upon the question by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that they do declare that no officer or souldier of the army ... shall leave the army without the particular licence and discharge of the generall.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Die Lunae 28 Junii 1647.
Includes also the vote to provide for the army.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
